statements: SELECT * FROM Nonprofit;
SELECT id, name FROM Nonprofit WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, mission FROM Nonprofit WHERE established_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE established_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Nonprofit;
SELECT MAX(established_date) FROM Nonprofit;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM Nonprofit;
SELECT DISTINCT(name) FROM Nonprofit;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE mission IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE established_date < '2010-01-01' OR established_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, name, mission, established_date FROM Nonprofit WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE name = 'Example Nonprofit' AND established_date > '2015-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE name = 'Nonprofit A' OR name = 'Nonprofit B';
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE mission LIKE '%education%';
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit WHERE name = 'Nonprofit C' AND mission = 'Education';
SELECT id, name, YEAR(established_date) FROM Nonprofit;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit_organization;
SELECT name, mission FROM nonprofit_organization;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT amount, donation_date FROM donations;
SELECT nonprofit_id, name FROM nonprofit_organization;
SELECT donation_id, amount, donation_date FROM donations;
SELECT nonprofit_id, SUM(amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donations GROUP BY nonprofit_id;
SELECT name, SUM(amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id GROUP BY name;
SELECT name, donation_date FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id;
SELECT name, AVG(amount) AS average_donation_amount FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id GROUP BY name;
SELECT name, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id GROUP BY name;
SELECT nonprofit_id, name, amount FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id;
SELECT name, MAX(amount) AS max_donation_amount FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id GROUP BY name;
SELECT name, MIN(amount) AS min_donation_amount FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id GROUP BY name;

SELECT name, AVG(amount) AS average_donation_amount, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id GROUP BY name;
SELECT name, DATEDIFF(NOW(), established_date) AS years_since_established FROM nonprofit_organization;
SELECT name, donation_date, DATEDIFF(NOW(), donation_date) AS days_since_donation FROM nonprofit_organization JOIN donations ON nonprofit_organization.nonprofit_id = donations.nonprofit_id;
SELECT nonprofit_id, COUNT(donation_id) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY nonprofit_id;
SELECT DATEDIFF(NOW(), established_date) AS years_since_established FROM nonprofit_organization;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donations;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_donation_amount FROM donations;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit.Organization;
SELECT org_name FROM Nonprofit.Organization WHERE org_type = 'Charity';
SELECT org_name, org_type FROM Nonprofit.Organization WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit.Project;
SELECT project_name FROM Nonprofit.Project WHERE org_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, org_name FROM Nonprofit.Project P JOIN Nonprofit.Organization O ON P.org_id = O.org_id;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit.Donation;
SELECT donor_name FROM Nonprofit.Donation WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Nonprofit.Donation WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT D.donor_name, P.project_name, O.org_name FROM Nonprofit.Donation D JOIN Nonprofit.Project P ON D.project_id = P.project_id JOIN Nonprofit.Organization O ON P.org_id = O.org_id;
SELECT * FROM Nonprofit.Organization WHERE org_id = 1 OR org_id = 2 OR org_id = 3;
SELECT project_name FROM Nonprofit.Project WHERE org_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM Nonprofit.Donation GROUP BY donor_name;

SELECT org_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM Nonprofit.Organization O JOIN Nonprofit.Project P ON O.org_id = P.org_id JOIN Nonprofit.Donation D ON P.project_id = D.project_id GROUP BY org_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Nonprofit.Organization;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Nonprofit.Project;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Nonprofit.Donation;
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) FROM Nonprofit.Donation;
SELECT MAX(donation_amount) FROM Nonprofit.Donation;
SELECT MIN(donation_amount) FROM Nonprofit.Donation;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.organization;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.donor;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.donation;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.volunteer;
SELECT organization_id, name FROM nonprofit.organization;
SELECT donor_id, name, email FROM nonprofit.donor;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, organization_id, amount, donation_date FROM nonprofit.donation;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, contact_number, organization_id FROM nonprofit.volunteer;
SELECT organization_id, name, mission_statement FROM nonprofit.organization;
SELECT donor_id, name, email FROM nonprofit.donor WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, organization_id, amount FROM nonprofit.donation WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, organization_id FROM nonprofit.volunteer WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.donor WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT donor_id, name, email FROM nonprofit.donor WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, organization_id, amount FROM nonprofit.donation WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT volunteer_id, name, organization_id FROM nonprofit.volunteer WHERE name LIKE '%Jane%';
SELECT organization_id, name, mission_statement FROM nonprofit.organization WHERE name = 'Red Cross';
SELECT donor.name, donation.amount FROM nonprofit.donor JOIN nonprofit.donation ON donor.donor_id = donation.donor_id;
SELECT organization.name, donation.amount FROM nonprofit.organization JOIN nonprofit.donation ON organization.organization_id = donation.organization_id;
SELECT volunteer.name, organization.name FROM nonprofit.volunteer JOIN nonprofit.organization ON volunteer.organization_id = organization.organization_id;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.organization;
SELECT name, location FROM nonprofit.organization;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.project;
SELECT name, description FROM nonprofit.project;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.member;
SELECT name, email FROM nonprofit.member;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.donation;
SELECT amount, donation_date FROM nonprofit.donation;
SELECT * FROM nonprofit.volunteer;
SELECT name, skillset FROM nonprofit.volunteer;
SELECT o.name, p.name FROM nonprofit.organization o JOIN nonprofit.project p ON o.id = p.organization_id;
SELECT m.name, d.amount FROM nonprofit.member m JOIN nonprofit.donation d ON m.id = d.member_id;
SELECT v.name, o.location FROM nonprofit.volunteer v JOIN nonprofit.organization o ON v.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT p.name, m.email FROM nonprofit.project p JOIN nonprofit.member m ON p.organization_id = m.organization_id;
SELECT d.amount, d.donation_date, m.email FROM nonprofit.donation d JOIN nonprofit.member m ON d.member_id = m.id;
SELECT v.name, v.skillset, o.name FROM nonprofit.volunteer v JOIN nonprofit.organization o ON v.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT d.amount, o.name FROM nonprofit.donation d JOIN nonprofit.organization o ON d.member_id = o.id;
SELECT m.name, m.email, o.location FROM nonprofit.member m JOIN nonprofit.organization o ON m.organization_id = o.id;
SELECT p.name, p.description, m.name FROM nonprofit.project p JOIN nonprofit.member m ON p.organization_id = m.organization_id;
